input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP x Bleach Team Evo Cargo Bibs'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Training Bib Shorts Men's'
  - Name='MAAP World Tour Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Bib Shorts II'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Riding Short'
  - Name='Assos Equipe RS Spring Fall Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura FS260-Pro DS II Bib Short'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Competizione 2 Bibshort LTD'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Unlimited Endurance'
  - Name='ASSOS T.laalalaishorts_S7'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Explore Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Equipe RS S11 Long Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Canyon Short w/Liner Men's'
  - Name='Sportful BodyFit Team Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Cycling Shorts with Liner'
  - Name='Castelli Entrata Limited Edition Bib Short Men's'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Pro Bib Short'
  - Name='Gobik Men's Grenadiers 2025 Lancer Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Expedition Pro Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Core Cargo Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Delta Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Reflective Core Cargo Bib'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP x Bleach Team Evo Cargo Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bib short with cargo feature, indicating similar bib construction but likely different intended use or styling, slightly less focused on pro-level shock absorption or ventilation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Training Bib Shorts Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro team training bib shorts designed for performance and comfort, closely matching the reference's usage and features as a high-end bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP World Tour Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: World Tour team bib shorts likely high performance and similar construction, matching the professional level of the reference bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Bib Shorts II
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro team bib shorts, advanced construction, similar target user and intended use as the reference bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Riding Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Riding shorts imply no bib, hence different silhouette and construction, partially relevant as cycling apparel but less comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe RS Spring Fall Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance bib shorts with seasonal adaptation, very similar in construction and intended use to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura FS260-Pro DS II Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib short with pro-level features, though possibly less emphasis on antimicrobial chamois or shock absorption technology than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Competizione 2 Bibshort LTD
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium pro-level bibshort, similar in silhouette, performance focus, and advanced features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Unlimited Endurance
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High endurance bibshorts likely similar construction and function, slightly different positioning or feature focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS T.laalalaishorts_S7
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Name suggests shorts but not bib shorts, less similar in silhouette and construction to reference bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Explore Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Explore shorts likely shorter, without bib, designed for more casual or adventure riding, less technically focused than racing bibs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Equipe RS S11 Long Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long bib shorts variant in Equipe RS series, closely similar technically except possibly longer leg coverage but similar function and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Canyon Short w/Liner Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner but no bib, different silhouette, less technical than pro bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful BodyFit Team Classic Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic team bib shorts focusing on fit and performance, slightly less advanced possibly but overall very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Cycling Shorts with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner but no bib straps, different in silhouette and support compared to bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Entrata Limited Edition Bib Short Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Limited edition bib shorts from a premium brand, stylistically similar and functionally relevant though may differ in technology level.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Pro Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro bib short for women, similar construction and intended use but different gender fit, still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gobik Men's Grenadiers 2025 Lancer Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's bib shorts from a performance brand, similar silhouette and purpose, slightly less known technology cited.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Expedition Pro Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro cycling bib shorts designed for women, advanced features for long rides, very close in function and design intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Core Cargo Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib short with cargo feature from the same brand, suggesting different focus from Pro Delta bibshort but similar silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Delta Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model bibshort specifically for women from the same brand, identical in most respects except gender fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Reflective Core Cargo Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand cargo bib with reflective features, less performance-focused than Pro Delta, but similar bib silhouette.
